title: Social cleavages and policy in China

content.question: Describe a major social cleavage in China. Discuss two policies the Chinese state has adopted since 1990 in response to that cleavage.

frqParts.text: Describe a major social cleavage in China. Discuss two policies the Chinese state has adopted since 1990 in response to that cleavage.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
